content:
Here's a possible response:

"Thanks for the suggestions! I think I'll start by creating a YouTube video on sustainable skincare, focusing on eco-friendly products and zero-waste skincare routines. I'll also create an Instagram post highlighting some of my favorite natural and organic skincare products. For my Instagram Stories, I'll share some quick tips on how to customize your skincare routine based on your skin type. Let me know if you have any other ideas or suggestions!"
